pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Saturday, February 1, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Scarborough, Ontario  

10:30 a.m.  The Prime Minister will participate in a Lunar New Year celebration, and will deliver brief remarks.

Casa Deluz
1571 Sandhurst Circle

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.

The Prime Minister will meet with family members of the victims of the Flight PS752 tragedy.

Closed to media.
